title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings and tool calling.

title: llama-index-integrations-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration enabling local Ollama models for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper (Go) that adds prompts, templates and batch scripting on top of ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from Ollama over fetch-event-source.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers query local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as Generator or Embedder in pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an Ollama4j client bean for Java services.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation keeping Ollama and its CUDA builds available in nixpkgs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Experimental Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-like interfaces.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library exposing Ollama APIs with GenServer-backed streaming for Phoenix LiveView apps.
